title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Spending time alone in nature enables you to reunite with the untamed edges of your own mind and heart. In fact, a simple trip to a city park to walk your dog might prove as restorative as a longer jaunt into the forest or a voyage out to sea. The venue isnt as important now as claiming space to listen to your own thoughts and feel the natural continuity of life around you. This kind of spiritual reconnection might be difficult to articulate to others or even fully fathom yourself. Poet Alfred Lord Tennyson wrote, Words, like nature, half reveal and half conceal the soul within." Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
